page.title: 11LIFE STYLES Places to go
page.content: {Over 18 years; begin to meet in pubs and in discos. Those younger join clubs like Boys Brigade,sports clubs ,and meet in the village street in the evenings. {30_60 years Bingo held at memorial hall. Coffee mornings once a month held at memorial hall. Old time dancing at memorial hall once a month. Kings Arms pub opens every day and night Mon._Fri.11am_3pm and 6pm_11pm.Sun.12pm_2pm and 7pm_11pm. {60+years }Burton show held once a year in August. Bingo in memorial hall twice a week. Pub open all week. Tapestry classes once a week. Church every Sunday. Coffee morning for charity every month at the memorial hall.
